senses.sense_definition: Having more than the normal number of fingers or toes.

examples.text: The <w>polydactyl</w> cat became famous in the neighborhood for having six toes on each paw.
Genetic testing revealed that the condition was hereditary, resulting in <w>polydactyl</w> offspring.

senses.sense_definition: An animal or person born with more than the normal number of fingers or toes.

examples.text: Ernest Hemingway was known for keeping <w>polydactyls</w> at his home in Key West.
Because the kitten is a <w>polydactyl</w>, it has better balance when climbing trees.
